titles.title: Am I a Soldier of the Cross

comments.comment: This hymnal has not been proofed - data may be incomplete or incorrect

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Am I a soldier of the cross, a foll'wer of the Lamb? And shall I fear to own His cause or blush to speak His Name?

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Must I be carried to the skies on flow'ry beds of ease, while others fought to win the prize and sailed through bloody seas?

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Are there no foes for me to face? Must I not stem the flood? Is this vile world a friend to grace to help me on to God?

verse.name: v4
v5
verse.lines: Thy saints in all this glorious war shall conquer, though they die; they see the triumph from afar by faith's discerning eye.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: When that illustrious day shall rise, and all Thine armies shine in robes of vict'ry through the skies, the glory shall be Thine.
